display name: Sri Bhramaramba Mallikarjuna Swamy Vara Devasthanam (Main Temple)
name_te: శ్రీ భ్రమరాంబ మల్లికార్జున స్వామి వర దేవస్థానం (ప్రధాన ఆలయం)
name_hi: श्री भ्रमराम्बा मल्लिकार्जुन स्वामी वर देवस्थानम (मुख्य मंदिर)
name_ta: ஸ்ரீ பிரம்மராம்பா மல்லிகார்ஜுன ஸ்வாமி வர தேவஸ்தானம் (முக்கிய கோவில்)
name_kn: ಶ್ರೀ ಭ್ರಮರಾಂಬಾ ಮಲ್ಲಿಕಾರ್ಜುನ ಸ್ವಾಮಿ ವರ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನ (ಮುಖ್ಯ ದೇವಾಲಯ)
name_ml: ശ്രീ ഭ്രമരാംബ മല്ലികാർജ്ജുന സ്വാമി വര ദേവസ്ഥാനം (പ്രധാന ക്ഷേത്രം)
description_en: This is the main temple complex of Srisailam, dedicated to Lord Mallikarjuna and Goddess Bhramaramba. It is one of the twelve Jyotirlingas of Lord Shiva. The temple is a major pilgrimage center attracting devotees from across the country.
description_te: ఇది శ్రీశైలంలోని ప్రధాన ఆలయ సముదాయం, ఇది మల్లికార్జున స్వామి మరియు భ్రమరాంబ దేవికి అంకితం చేయబడింది. ఇది శివుని పన్నెండు జ్యోతిర్లింగాలలో ఒకటి. ఈ ఆలయం దేశవ్యాప్తంగా భక్తులను ఆకర్షించే ప్రధాన తీర్థయాత్ర కేంద్రం.
description_hi: यह श्रीशैलम का मुख्य मंदिर परिसर है, जो भगवान मल्लिकार्जुन और देवी भ्रामरम्बा को समर्पित है। यह भगवान शिव के बारह ज्योतिर्लिंगों में से एक है। यह मंदिर एक प्रमुख तीर्थस्थल है, जहाँ देशभर से श्रद्धालु दर्शन के लिए आते हैं।
description_ta: இது ஸ்ரீசைலத்தின் முக்கிய கோயில் வளாகமாகும், இது மல்லிகார்ஜுனருக்கும் பிரம்மராம்பா தேவிக்கும் அர்ப்பணிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. இது சிவபெருமானின் பன்னிரண்டு ஜோதிர்லிங்கங்களில் ஒன்றாகும். நாடு முழுவதிலுமிருந்து பக்தர்களை ஈர்க்கும் ஒரு முக்கிய யாத்திரை மையமாக இந்த கோயில் உள்ளது.
description_kn: ಇದು ಶ್ರೀಶೈಲದ ಪ್ರಮುಖ ದೇವಾಲಯ ಸಂಕೀರ್ಣವಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಮಲ್ಲಿಕಾರ್ಜುನ ದೇವರು ಮತ್ತು ಭ್ರಮರಾಂಬ ದೇವಿಗೆ ಸಮರ್ಪಿತವಾಗಿದೆ. ಇದು ಶಿವನ ಹನ್ನೆರಡು ಜ್ಯೋತಿರ್ಲಿಂಗಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಒಂದಾಗಿದೆ. ಈ ದೇವಾಲಯವು ದೇಶಾದ್ಯಂತದ ಭಕ್ತರನ್ನು ಆಕರ್ಷಿಸುವ ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಯಾತ್ರಾ ಕೇಂದ್ರವಾಗಿದೆ.
description_ml: ശ്രീശൈലത്തിലെ പ്രധാന ക്ഷേത്ര സമുച്ചയമാണിത്, മല്ലികാർജ്ജുനനും ഭ്രമരംബ ദേവിക്കും സമർപ്പിച്ചിരിക്കുന്നു. ശിവന്റെ പന്ത്രണ്ട് ജ്യോതിർലിംഗങ്ങളിൽ ഒന്നാണിത്. രാജ്യമെമ്പാടുമുള്ള ഭക്തരെ ആകർഷിക്കുന്ന ഒരു പ്രധാന തീർത്ഥാടന കേന്ദ്രമാണിത്.

display name: South Gopuram of Mallikarjuna Swamy Temple
name_hi: मल्लिकार्जुन स्वामी मंदिर का दक्षिण गोपुरम
description_en:
The South Gopuram is one of the main gateway towers of the Mallikarjuna Swamy Temple in Srisailam.
It reflects traditional Dravidian temple architecture and detailed craftsmanship.
The gopuram serves as an important entrance for devotees.

This temple is dedicated to Lord Ganesha, believed to bear witness to the pilgrimage to Srisailam. Devotees traditionally visit this temple before or after main darshan. It is considered an important ritual stop.
description_te: ఈ ఆలయం శ్రీశైలం యాత్రకు సాక్ష్యంగా నిలుస్తుందని నమ్మే గణేశుడికి అంకితం చేయబడింది. ప్రధాన దర్శనానికి ముందు లేదా తర్వాత భక్తులు సాంప్రదాయకంగా ఈ ఆలయాన్ని సందర్శిస్తారు. ఇది ఒక ముఖ్యమైన ఆచార విహారంగా పరిగణించబడుతుంది.
description_hi: यह मंदिर भगवान गणेश को समर्पित है, जिनके बारे में माना जाता है कि वे श्रीशैलम की तीर्थयात्रा के साक्षी हैं। भक्त पारंपरिक रूप से मुख्य दर्शन से पहले या बाद में इस मंदिर में दर्शन करने आते हैं। इसे एक महत्वपूर्ण धार्मिक स्थल माना जाता है।
description_ta: இந்தக் கோயில் ஸ்ரீசைலம் யாத்திரைக்கு சாட்சியாக இருப்பதாக நம்பப்படும் விநாயகர் கோயிலுக்கு அர்ப்பணிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. பக்தர்கள் பாரம்பரியமாக பிரதான தரிசனத்திற்கு முன்போ அல்லது பின்னரோ இந்தக் கோயிலுக்கு வருகிறார்கள். இது ஒரு முக்கியமான சடங்கு நிறுத்தமாகக் கருதப்படுகிறது.
description_kn: ಈ ದೇವಾಲಯವು ಗಣೇಶನಿಗೆ ಸಮರ್ಪಿತವಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಶ್ರೀಶೈಲ ತೀರ್ಥಯಾತ್ರೆಗೆ ಸಾಕ್ಷಿಯಾಗುತ್ತಾನೆ ಎಂದು ನಂಬಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಭಕ್ತರು ಸಾಂಪ್ರದಾಯಿಕವಾಗಿ ಮುಖ್ಯ ದರ್ಶನದ ಮೊದಲು ಅಥವಾ ನಂತರ ಈ ದೇವಾಲಯಕ್ಕೆ ಭೇಟಿ ನೀಡುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಇದನ್ನು ಒಂದು ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕ ನಿಲ್ದಾಣವೆಂದು ಪರಿಗಣಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ.
description_ml: ശ്രീശൈലത്തേക്കുള്ള തീർത്ഥാടനത്തിന് സാക്ഷ്യം വഹിക്കുന്നതായി വിശ്വസിക്കപ്പെടുന്ന ഗണപതിക്ക് സമർപ്പിച്ചിരിക്കുന്ന ക്ഷേത്രമാണിത്. പ്രധാന ദർശനത്തിന് മുമ്പോ ശേഷമോ ഭക്തർ പരമ്പരാഗതമായി ഈ ക്ഷേത്രം സന്ദർശിക്കാറുണ്ട്. ഇത് ഒരു പ്രധാന ആചാര കേന്ദ്രമായി കണക്കാക്കപ്പെടുന്നു.

description_en: Hatakeswaram Temple is an ancient Shiva shrine in Srisailam. It is mentioned in traditional references of the region. Devotees visit for peaceful worship.

Kumara Viharam is a sacred structure located in the Srisailam temple region.It is associated with the worship of Lord Kumara (Subrahmanya), the son of Lord Shiva.
The place is visited by devotees as part of their spiritual journey in Srisailam.

Saptha Matrukalu represents the seven mother goddesses worshipped in the Srisailam region.
Each goddess symbolizes divine feminine power and protection.
The shrine holds religious importance and is visited by devotees seeking blessings.

Srisaila Jagadguru Panditaradhya Peetham is a prominent Shaiva religious institution in Srisailam.
It is associated with spiritual teachings, traditions, and religious activities.
The Peetham plays a significant role in preserving Shaiva philosophy in the region.

Maha Nandi is a sacred representation of Nandi, the divine vehicle of Lord Shiva, located in Srisailam.
It is traditionally associated with the Nandyal region and brought here for worship.
Devotees offer prayers to Nandi as part of their visit to the Mallikarjuna Swamy Temple.

Jammi Chettu is a sacred tree located within the Srisailam temple surroundings.
It is closely associated with mythological traditions and Vijayadashami rituals.
Devotees consider the tree highly auspicious and spiritually significant.

The Chandramathi Statue in Srisailam represents Queen Chandramathi from Hindu mythology.
She is remembered for her devotion, patience, and righteousness.
The statue symbolizes moral values and spiritual strength.

Yagna Shala is a sacred ritual space located in the Srisailam temple area.
It is used for performing yagnas, homams, and Vedic fire rituals.
The place holds ritual purity and spiritual importance.

This temple is associated with the story of Mallamma, a devoted follower connected to Srisailam traditions. A sacred water source nearby is believed to have spiritual importance. Devotees visit the temple seeking blessings and peace.

display name: Sree Nidanapati Sree Prasanna Lakshmi Amarajyoti Peetham
name_te: శ్రీ నిదానపతి శ్రీ ప్రసన్న లక్ష్మీ అమరోజ్యోతి పీఠం
name_hi: श्री निदानपति श्री प्रसन्न लक्ष्मी अमरोज्योति पीठ
name_ta: ஸ்ரீ நிதானபதி ஸ்ரீ பிரசன்ன லக்ஷ்மி அமரோஜ்யோதி பீடம்
name_kn: ಶ್ರೀ ನಿದಾನಪತಿ ಶ್ರೀ ಪ್ರಸನ್ನ ಲಕ್ಷ್ಮೀ ಅಮರೋಜ್ಯೋತಿ ಪೀಠ
name_ml: ശ്രീ നിദാനപതി ശ്രീ പ്രസന്ന ലക്ഷ്മി അമരോജ്യോതി പീഠം
description_en: This peetham is dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi and serves as a spiritual center in Srisailam. It is known for regular worship, prayers, and religious activities. Devotees visit for prosperity and well-being.
This peetham is associated with the Shaivite saint tradition linked to Srisailam. It serves as a place for spiritual learning and devotion. Visitors come here for guidance and religious reflection.

Dedicated to Goddess Durga in her Mahishasura Mardini form, this temple represents the victory of good over evil. It is an important Shakti worship site in Srisailam. Devotees offer prayers for strength and protection.

This temple is dedicated to Goddess Chamundeshwari, a powerful form of Durga. It is worshipped by devotees seeking courage and divine blessings. The temple holds religious importance within the Srisailam region.
This Shiva temple houses a five-faced Shiva Lingam symbolizing different aspects of Lord Shiva. It is a spiritually significant shrine in Srisailam. Devotees visit for peace and divine grace.
A spiritual center associated with the Datta tradition, located in Srisailam. It is known for religious discourses, meditation, and prayers. Devotees visit seeking spiritual guidance and blessings.

This peetham is associated with Shaivite scholars and religious traditions of Srisailam. It serves as a center for worship and spiritual learning. Devotees visit for religious observances and guidance.
This temple is dedicated to Goddess Manikeswari, worshipped as a local form of Shakti. It holds spiritual importance for devotees in Srisailam. Visitors seek blessings for prosperity and protection.

The Srisailam Temple is an ancient shrine dedicated to Lord Mallikarjuna, located on the Nallamala Hills. It is one of the most sacred Shiva temples in India. The temple is known for its religious significance and architectural heritage.

Pathalaganga is a sacred bathing ghat on the Krishna River near the Srisailam Temple. Pilgrims take a holy dip here before proceeding for darshan. The site holds spiritual importance and scenic beauty.

These are sacred streams located in the forested region of Srisailam. They are associated with religious beliefs and ancient traditions. Devotees and visitors come here for spiritual and natural significance.

This temple commemorates the visit and devotion of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj to Srisailam. It reflects the historical and spiritual connection of the region. Devotees visit as part of temple exploration.

name_te: ఛత్రపతి శివాజీ మహారాజ ఆలయ ప్రవేశ ద్వారం
name_hi: छत्रपति शिवाजी महाराज मंदिर प्रवेश द्वार
name_ta: சத்ரபதி சிவாஜி மகாராஜ் கோவில் நுழைவு வாசல்
name_kn: ಛತ್ರಪತಿ ಶಿವಾಜಿ ಮಹಾರಾಜ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನ ಪ್ರವೇಶ ದ್ವಾರ
description_en: This is the entrance gateway leading to the Shivaji Maharaj Temple in Srisailam. It serves as the main access point for visitors. The entrance is marked as a notable landmark.

These Shiva Lingas represent the five natural elements according to Shaivite belief. They hold spiritual importance within the Srisailam temple area. Devotees worship them as part of traditional rituals.
This ancient temple represents an aged form of Lord Shiva. It is believed to be spiritually significant in Srisailam traditions. Devotees visit seeking peace and blessings.
This sacred tree is associated with traditional religious beliefs in Srisailam. Devotees offer prayers and perform rituals near the tree. It is considered spiritually significant.
This temple is dedicated to Goddess Rajarajeshwari, a form of Shakti. Devotees worship here for prosperity and spiritual strength. It is an important religious site in Srisailam.
This gopuram was built in memory of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj’s visit to Srisailam. It stands as a prominent architectural landmark. Visitors pass through it while exploring the temple area.
This sacred water kund is associated with rituals of the Mallikarjuna Temple. Devotees use it for purification purposes. It holds religious importance in temple traditions.
This temple is dedicated to Goddess Ishtakaameshwari, located in the Srisailam forest region. Devotees believe sincere prayers here fulfill wishes. It is considered an important Shakti shrine.

display name: Sri Uma Rama Lingeshwaraswamy Vari Temple
description_en: This temple worships Lord Shiva along with Uma and Rama aspects. It is known for its peaceful environment. Devotees visit for regular prayers and spiritual calmness.
This temple is dedicated to Ankalamma, the village deity of the region. Locals worship here for protection and community well-being. It plays an important role in local traditions.
This stone steps pathway leads pilgrims down to Pathalaganga. It is used by devotees accessing the sacred river ghat. The pathway is an important part of the pilgrimage route.
This gate is designated for free darshan entry to the Srisailam Temple. It helps manage pilgrim flow during peak times. Many devotees use this entrance for darshan access.
This open-air temple is dedicated to Lord Veerabhadra. Devotees worship here seeking strength and protection. It holds religious importance in Srisailam.
This peetham follows the Kanchi Kamakoti spiritual tradition. It serves as a religious center for prayers and spiritual activities. Devotees visit for blessings and guidance.
This temple is dedicated to Lord Veerabhadra and located in a calm environment. It is visited by devotees for worship and prayers. The temple is part of Srisailam’s religious landscape.
This shrine is associated with Varahi and Vajreshwari forms along with a Chandra Lingam. It holds spiritual importance in Srisailam worship traditions. Devotees visit for divine blessings.
This temple is dedicated to Lord Srikhareswara, a form of Lord Shiva. It is an important worship site in Srisailam. Devotees come seeking blessings and spiritual peace.

display name: Sri Sri Sri Lalitha Devi Peetham
description_en: This peetham is dedicated to Goddess Lalitha Devi. It is associated with Shakti worship and religious practices. Devotees visit for spiritual growth and blessings.
Srisailam Devasthanam Kala Vedika is a cultural and spiritual auditorium managed by the Srisailam Devasthanam.
It is used for religious discourses, cultural programs, meetings, and official temple events.
Official online system used for booking temple-managed accommodation in Srisailam.
Temple-associated guest house offering basic lodging near the main temple area.
Guest house maintained for railway staff and pilgrims with basic stay facilities.
Accommodation facility mainly used by pilgrims visiting from Karnataka state.
Pilgrim cottage providing simple accommodation near the temple surroundings.
Pilgrim cottage providing simple accommodation near the temple surroundings.
Cottage-style accommodation suitable for families and short pilgrim stays.
Pilgrim lodging facility offering affordable stay near the temple area.
Dormitory accommodation providing shared lodging for group pilgrims.
Enhanced dormitory facility offering better amenities for group stays.
Community-managed accommodation facility providing lodging for pilgrims.
Community-managed accommodation facility providing lodging for pilgrims.
Newly constructed building providing additional accommodation for pilgrims.
Charitable organization offering accommodation and pilgrim support services.

display name: Akhila Bharatha Vamsharaj Nithya Annadana Satram
name_hi: अखिला भरत वंश नित्य अन्नदाना सत्रम्
name_ta: அகில இந்திய வம்ச நித்ய அன்னதான சத்ரம்
name_kn: ಅಖಿಲ ಭಾರತ ವಂಶ ನಿತ್ಯ ಅನ್ನದಾನ ಸತ್ರ
name_ml: അഖില ഭാരത വംശ നിത്യ അന്നദാന സത്രം
description_en: Charitable satram providing free food and basic shelter to pilgrims.
Satram dedicated to daily annadanam and pilgrim support services.

display name: Sri Surya Bhagavan Surya Balija Satram
description_en: Community-run satram providing accommodation and annadanam facilities.
Community-managed satram offering lodging facilities for pilgrims.
Shaivite religious organization facility providing pilgrim accommodation.
Pilgrim lodging facility offering basic stay arrangements.
Charitable choultry providing free meals and resting space for pilgrims.
Accommodation block providing rooms for temple visitors.
Pilgrim accommodation block offering simple rooms near temple area.
Pilgrim rest house providing basic lodging facilities.
Community-run satram offering accommodation for Yadava devotees.
Pilgrim lodging facility located near the Pathala Ganga area.
Satram managed by Lingayat community trust for pilgrim accommodation.
Community-managed satram providing lodging for Kshatriya devotees.
Satram offering accommodation support for Velama community pilgrims.
Community-run satram providing lodging facilities for pilgrims.
Accommodation rooms maintained by Mudiraj community for pilgrims.
Community-managed satram offering basic lodging facilities.
Satram run by Katika community providing pilgrim accommodation.

display name: Akhila Bharata Arya Vysya Annapurna Satram
description_en: Charitable satram offering free meals and accommodation to pilgrims.

display name: Sri Sarana Basaweswara Sadasivaah Anna Satram
name_ta: ஸ்ரீ சரண பசவேஸ்வர சதாசிவ அன்ன சத்ரம்
name_kn: ಶ್ರೀ ಶರಣ ಬಸವೇಶ್ವರ ಸದಾಶಿವ ಅನ್ನ ಸತ್ರ
name_ml: ശ്രീ ശരണ ബസവേശ്വര സദാശിവ അന്ന സത്രം
description_en: Charitable satram focused on annadanam and pilgrim support.
Satram providing free food and services for pilgrims.
Community-run satram providing accommodation for Padmashali devotees.
Satram managed by Gowda community offering lodging for pilgrims.
Organization providing annadanam and basic pilgrim facilities.
Pilgrim accommodation facility named after Neelam Sanjeeva Reddy.

display name: Sri Mallikarjuna Annasatra Sangam & T.G. Lakshmi Venkatesh Bhavan
description_en: Charitable complex providing free food and accommodation to pilgrims.
Pilgrim lodging facility offering simple accommodation near Pathaleswara area.

display name: Akhila Bharata Vaddera Srisaila Kshetra Vidya Raja (Vaddu)
name_te: అఖిల భారత వడ్డెర శ్రీశైలం క్షేత్ర విద్యా రాజా (వడ్డు)
name_ta: அகில இந்திய வட்டேர ஸ்ரீசைலம் க்ஷேத்ர வித்யா ராஜா (வட்து)
name_kn: ಅಖಿಲ ಭಾರತ ವಡ್ಡೆರ ಶ್ರೀಶೈಲಂ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರ ವಿದ್ಯಾ ರಾಜ (ವಡ್ಡು)
name_ml: അഖില ഭാരത വഡ്ഡെര ശ്രീശൈലം ക്ഷേത്ര വിദ്യാ രാജ (വഡ്ഡു)
description_en: Community-run satram providing accommodation for Vaddera devotees.
Service-oriented pilgrim accommodation center offering basic facilities.

display name: Sri Krishna Devaraya Kapu Satram & Charitable Trust
description_en: Community-managed satram providing accommodation and pilgrim services.
Devanga community satram offering lodging for pilgrims.

display name: Akhila Bharata Srisaila Shalivahana Kummara Satram
description_en: Community-run satram providing accommodation and support to pilgrims.
Sri Sadasivananda Ashram is a spiritual retreat center. It supports meditation and religious activities. The environment is peaceful. Entry is regulated.

Sringeri Shankara Matam is associated with the Sringeri spiritual tradition. It serves as a place for worship and guidance. Religious activities are conducted regularly. Visitors are allowed during specific times.
Sarangadhara Matham is a traditional religious matham. It supports spiritual practices and shelter for devotees. The premises are used for religious activities. Entry follows the matham’s rules.
Ghanta Matham is a small religious establishment in Srisailam. It is associated with spiritual observances. The environment is quiet and disciplined. Visitors may enter during permitted hours.
Vibhuti Matham is known for religious and spiritual practices. It serves devotees visiting the area. Activities follow traditional customs. Access may be regulated.
Bheema Sankara Matham is a religious center linked to Shaiva traditions. It provides space for worship and rest. The matham follows a fixed daily routine. Visitors must follow guidelines.
This matham is a religious institution dedicated to spiritual learning. It supports rituals and traditional teachings. The premises are maintained for devotees. Entry is subject to rules.
Viswamitra Mattam is a religious rest and worship center. It supports devotees visiting Srisailam. The setting is calm and spiritual. Entry is limited to permitted hours.
Kaalabhairav Matham is a religious matham linked to Shaiva worship. It is used for prayers and rituals. The premises are maintained by caretakers. Visitors must follow temple customs.

name_hi: काशी रेड्डी नयन नित्य अन्नदान आश्रम
name_ta: காசி ரெட்டி நயன நித்ய அன்னதான ஆசிரமம்
name_kn: ಕಾಶಿ ರೆಡ್ಡಿ ನಯನ ನಿತ್ಯ ಅನ್ನದಾನ ಆಶ್ರಮ
name_ml: കാശി റെഡ്ഡി നയന നിത്യ അന്നദാന ആശ്രമം
description_en: This ashramam provides free daily meals to devotees. It operates as part of charitable services. Food is served at fixed timings.
This ashram is dedicated to spiritual practices and silence observance. It supports devotees seeking a calm environment. Activities follow strict discipline. Visitor access is controlled.

display name: Sri Sri Sri Dattagiri Maharaj Ashram
name_te: శ్రీ శ్రీ శ్రీ దత్తగిరి మహారాజ్ ఆశ్రమం
name_hi: श्री श्री श्री दत्तगिरी महाराज आश्रम
name_ta: ஸ்ரீ ஸ்ரீ ஸ்ரீ தத்தகிரி மகாராஜ் ஆசிரமம்
name_kn: ಶ್ರೀ ಶ್ರೀ ಶ್ರೀ ದತ್ತಗಿರಿ ಮಹಾರಾಜ ಆಶ್ರಮ
name_ml: ശ്രീ ശ്രീ ശ്രീ ദത്തഗിരി മഹാരാജ ആശ്രമം
description_en: This ashram serves as a spiritual residence and worship place. Religious routines are followed daily. It supports devotees visiting the area. Entry is allowed as per ashram rules.
Sri Mounaswami Asramam is focused on meditation and silent practices. It offers a peaceful setting for devotees. Daily activities follow a fixed schedule. Access is limited.
Hindu Maala Satram provides accommodation and support for pilgrims. It is mainly used for rest and short stays. Facilities are simple. Usage follows satram guidelines.
This annachhetram provides free meals to devotees daily. Food is served at fixed hours. The service supports pilgrims and visitors. Managed as a charitable facility.
Karnabhaktula Sevasadan offers service facilities for devotees. It supports lodging or meal-related services. Operations depend on availability. Entry follows management rules.

display name: Sri Sri Sri Ratnanda Swamulu Vari Ashramam
name_te: శ్రీ శ్రీ శ్రీ రత్నానంద స్వాముల వారి ఆశ్రమం
name_hi: श्री श्री श्री रत्नानंद स्वामुलु वारी आश्रम
name_ta: ஸ்ரீ ஸ்ரீ ஸ்ரீ ரத்னானந்த ஸ்வாமுலு வாரி ஆசிரமம்
name_kn: ಶ್ರೀ ಶ್ರೀ ಶ್ರೀ ರತ್ನಾನಂದ ಸ್ವಾಮುಲು ವಾರಿ ಆಶ್ರಮ
name_ml: ശ്രീ ശ്രീ ശ്രീ രത്നാനന്ദ സ്വാമുലു വാരി ആശ്രമം
description_en: This ashram is a religious center for spiritual activities. It supports devotees and residents. Daily routines are maintained. Visitor access is subject to permission.

Rudraksha Matham is a religious monastery located in the Srisailam area. It serves as a place for spiritual activities and rest for devotees. Daily routines are followed by the residents. Visitor access is usually limited.
A large hydroelectric dam built across the Krishna River near Srisailam. It plays a key role in power generation and water storage. Visitors usually view it from designated public areas only.
A public viewing area that offers a clear sight of the dam structure. It is commonly used for sightseeing and photography. Best visited during daylight hours.
A well-known spot providing a wide-angle view of the dam and surrounding hills. It is accessible by road and often crowded during peak seasons. Safety railings are provided.
A viewpoint overlooking the water reservoir formed by the dam. It gives a calm view of the stored water and nearby forest area. Suitable for short halts.
A river access point on the banks of the Krishna River. Pilgrims and visitors come here for river viewing and basic rituals. Steps lead down to the water level.
A designated area near Pathalaganga for performing ancestral rituals. It is managed by temple authorities. Facilities are simple and guided by priests.

display name: Srisailam Project View Point – Pathalaganga Steps
description_en: A viewing point located along the steps leading to Pathalaganga. It offers a combined view of the river and project area. Used mainly as a resting and viewing spot.
The riverbank area along the Krishna River at Srisailam. It is used for walking, viewing the river flow, and boating access. The area is maintained for public movement.
A designated point where boats operate on the Krishna River. Tickets are required before boarding. Boat rides depend on water levels and weather conditions.
A general viewing area facing the Krishna River. It allows visitors to observe the river flow and surrounding landscape. Seating may be limited
A cable ropeway operated by Andhra Pradesh Tourism. It connects upper areas to the river level for easier access. Operation depends on maintenance and weather.
The boarding and exit station for the APTDC ropeway near the river. Ticket verification and queue management are done here. Basic waiting facilities are available.

name_kn: APTDC ಕೇಬಲ್ ಕಾರ್ & ಬೋಟಿಂಗ್ ಟಿಕೆಟ್ ಕೌಂಟರ್
name_ml: APTDC കേബിൾ കാർ & ബോട്ടിംഗ് ടിക്കറ്റ് കൗണ്ടർ
description_en: A common ticket counter for ropeway and boating services. Visitors must purchase tickets here before using the services. Payment options may vary.
A boating facility managed by Andhra Pradesh Tourism. Boats operate at fixed timings under supervision. Life jackets are generally provided.
An official boating access point operated by APTDC. It connects visitors to short river rides. Entry is regulated by ticket availability.
A general boarding area for river boating activities. Access depends on crowd levels and water conditions. Staff guide visitors during boarding.
A constructed platform used for safe boarding and exiting of boats. It helps manage queues and movement near the river. Slippery during monsoon season.
A viewing spot near the boating zone. Visitors can watch boating activities and river movement. It is mainly used for short stops.
The official counter for purchasing entry tickets to Akkamahadevi Caves. Visitor information and boat coordination are handled here. Tickets are mandatory.
A maintained green park area for relaxation and walking. It has planted trees and shaded paths. Suitable for families and elderly visitors.
A park maintained by temple authorities. It provides seating and walking space near temple surroundings. Cleanliness is regularly managed.
A small park area located near the temple pond. It includes electronic toilet facilities for visitors. Useful for short rest stops.
A recreational area with landscaped sections and themed elements. Mainly used for leisure walks and family visits. Facilities are basic.
A park area dedicated for visitor rest and movement. It has seating arrangements and greenery. Located close to main visitor routes.
A green zone developed as part of plantation and conservation efforts. It offers shaded walking paths. Entry is usually free.
A plantation area with maintained walking paths. It supports eco-friendly tourism. Suitable for calm, short visits.
A garden area near temple surroundings. It is used for relaxation and waiting time. Seating and pathways are available.
A forested garden zone developed for conservation and visitor access. It provides a quiet environment. Walking is the main activity.
A landscaped area featuring natural rock formations. It offers photo spots and walking paths. Surfaces may be uneven.
A commonly referred area for seasonal waterfalls around Srisailam. Water flow depends on rainfall. Access may be limited during dry seasons.
A natural water body near Srisailam. It is mainly viewed as a local attraction. Facilities around it are minimal.
A natural stream area with flowing water from the hills. Access involves walking steps. Flow depends on season and rainfall.
A museum displaying tribal lifestyle, tools, and cultural information. It is educational and informative. Entry timings are fixed.
A large statue installation depicting Shiva and Parvati. It is a visual landmark for visitors. Usually accessed by road.
An open-air seating area used for cultural programs and gatherings. Seating is tiered. Events are held occasionally.
A local sightseeing service covering nearby attractions. Tours operate on fixed routes and timings. Booking is required.
A cloak room facility with a fountain landmark nearby. Visitors can store belongings securely here. Useful before temple entry.
Shikhara Srisaila Pushkarini is a sacred temple water tank located near the Shikharam area of Srisailam.Devotees consider the water holy and use it for ritual bathing and religious practices.

Rudraksha Vanam is a sacred forest area located in the Srisailam region.
It is known for Rudraksha trees, which are closely associated with Lord Shiva.
The area offers a peaceful spiritual atmosphere for pilgrims.

Mahadeva Nandi is the sacred bull associated with Lord Mallikarjuna in Srisailam.
Nandi symbolizes devotion, discipline, and unwavering faith.
Devotees traditionally worship Nandi before entering the main temple.
APTDC Restaurant is a government-operated dining facility managed by Andhra Pradesh Tourism. It serves standard vegetarian and non-vegetarian meals.
Trishul Family Restaurant offers regular Indian meals in a family-friendly setting. The restaurant provides basic seating for small and large groups
Hotel Sahasra has an in-house restaurant serving daily vegetarian meals. The food is simple and suitable for pilgrims. Service is steady during peak hours. It is convenient for guests staying nearby.
Hotel Sravani serves South Indian meals and breakfast items. The restaurant focuses on quick service. Seating is limited but functional. It is suitable for short meal stops.
Hotel Manjunath provides vegetarian meals in a simple dining setup. The food is prepared in a traditional style. It is frequently used by pilgrims.
Hotel Apoorva offers basic South Indian meals for visitors. The dining area is simple and clean. Service is focused on affordability and speed. It is located within Srisailam town.
Hotel Sai Balaji serves vegetarian meals and breakfast items. The restaurant has a straightforward seating arrangement.
Hotel Ilapuram provides regular vegetarian food options. The restaurant is known for steady service during busy times. Meals are simple and filling. It is located near lodging facilities.
Hotel Krishnaveni Darshan has a restaurant attached to the hotel premises. It serves daily meals for guests and walk-in visitors. The menu mainly includes South Indian dishes.
Hotel Sai Raghavendra offers vegetarian meals suitable for pilgrims. The dining area is modest and clean. Service is focused on regular meal preparation.
Eliya Hotel is a small eatery serving basic vegetarian meals. The food is simple and freshly prepared. Seating is limited. It is suitable for quick dining.
Shrishail serves local-style vegetarian food. The restaurant focuses on simple meal options. It is frequently visited by temple visitors.
Srisalam offers regular South Indian food items. The meals are affordable and simple. It caters mainly to pilgrims and local visitors. Seating is basic.
Ganesh Food Court provides multiple food options under one roof. It has seating suitable for families and groups. Both snacks and full meals are available. It is a convenient dining stop.
Tri Shakti Canteen serves simple vegetarian meals in a canteen-style setup. The food is prepared for quick service.
Amma Catering provides cooked vegetarian meals and catering services. The food follows traditional preparation methods. It is often used for group meals. Service depends on demand.
This tiffin center serves vegetarian South Indian breakfast items. Food is prepared for quick consumption. Service is fast during morning hours. Seating is limited.
Maheshwari Tiffin Centre specializes in breakfast items like idli and dosa. It mainly operates in the morning. Service is quick and efficient.
Alluramma Tiffin Hotel offers vegetarian breakfast items. The setup is small with basic seating. Food is served fresh.
Lucky Tiffins serves common South Indian tiffin items. The food is affordable and filling. Service is fast. It is suitable for short stops.
Amurutha Tiffin Center provides vegetarian tiffins and light meals. It operates mainly during morning hours.
Sri Nandhini Food serves simple vegetarian meals. The focus is on regular daily food. Seating and service are basic. It is located within the town area.
Naidu's Hotel offers South Indian meals and breakfast options. The dining area is modest.
Nandini Tea Point is a small stall serving tea and light refreshments. It is used for short breaks. Seating is minimal. Service is quick.
No 1 Tea Stall serves tea and basic snacks. It has a small setup with limited seating.
Tea Break is a refreshment point offering tea and snacks. It is meant for quick stops. Seating may be limited. It is located near busy walking areas.
Sri Giri Juice Shop serves fresh fruit juices and beverages. It is popular during daytime. Service is quick. It provides refreshment for visitors.
Ranjit Juice Center offers seasonal fruit juices and drinks.
Chalo Chat Pani Puri is a street-style snack outlet. It serves pani puri and chaat items. Food is prepared fresh
Annadanam & Laddu Prasadam provides free meals and temple prasadam. The service is managed by temple authorities. Meals are served at fixed timings.
Srisailam Free Bhojanalaya offers free vegetarian meals to pilgrims. The facility operates daily. Food is served at scheduled times.
Annapura Bhavan is a dining facility serving simple vegetarian meals. It is designed to handle many visitors at once. Seating is spacious.
Main government bus stand providing APSRTC bus services connecting Srisailam with nearby towns and cities.

display name: APSRTC and TSRTC Advance Booking Counter
name_te: APSRTC మరియు TSRTC ముందస్తు బుకింగ్ కౌంటర్
name_hi: एपीएसआरटीसी और टीएसआरटीसी अग्रिम बुकिंग काउंटर
name_ta: APSRTC மற்றும் TSRTC முன்பதிவு டிக்கெட் கவுண்டர்
name_kn: APSRTC ಮತ್ತು TSRTC ಮುಂಗಡ ಟಿಕೆಟ್ ಬುಕ್ಕಿಂಗ್ ಕೌಂಟರ್
name_ml: APSRTC, TSRTC മുൻകൂർ ടിക്കറ്റ് ബുക്കിംഗ് കൗണ്ടർ
description_en: Advance ticket booking counter for APSRTC and TSRTC bus services operating from Srisailam.

name_te: నాయుడు ట్రావెల్స్ శ్రీశైలం క్యాబ్ & ట్యాక్సీ సేవలు
name_ta: நாயுடு டிராவல்ஸ் ஸ்ரீசைலம் கேப் & டாக்ஸி சேவை
name_kn: ನಾಯ್ಡು ಟ್ರಾವೆಲ್ಸ್ ಶ್ರೀಶೈಲಂ ಕ್ಯಾಬ್ & ಟ್ಯಾಕ್ಸಿ ಸೇವೆಗಳು
description_en: Local travel service offering cabs and taxis for sightseeing and nearby travel from Srisailam.
Private cab service providing local and outstation transportation for pilgrims and visitors.
Travel service offering four-wheel vehicle rentals for temple visits and local travel.

Devastanam Hospital is a medical facility managed by the temple administration. It provides basic healthcare services to pilgrims and staff. Emergency care is available when required. The hospital operates throughout the day.

The Primary Health Center offers basic medical treatment and first aid services. It supports local residents and visitors. Services include general checkups and primary care. Serious cases are referred to higher hospitals.
SST Home & Health Sri Sailam provides health-related services and care support. It focuses on basic medical assistance. The facility operates during fixed hours. It serves local needs.
Mallanna Medical & Fancy Store sells medicines and daily-use medical items. It also offers small personal and convenience products.
Srisalam 1Town Police Station handles law and order within the local area. Police support is available at all times.

The Fire Station in Srisailam provides emergency fire and rescue services. It responds to fire accidents and safety situations. Staff are trained for emergency response. Services operate round the clock.

The Sub Post Office offers postal services including mail and parcels. Basic banking-related postal services may also be available. It serves residents and visitors. Operations follow standard working hours.
Wisdom School is an educational institution serving local students. It provides regular academic instruction. The school operates during daytime hours. Access is mainly for enrolled students.
Chaitanya School offers formal education to children in the area. It follows a structured academic schedule. School activities run on working days. Entry is limited to students and staff.
The High School provides secondary-level education. It serves students from surrounding areas. Classes are conducted on regular school days.
ZPHS Srisailam is a government-run high school. It offers secondary education to local students. The school follows state education guidelines. Activities are limited to school hours.
Veerashaiva Gurukulam is a traditional learning center. It focuses on religious and cultural education. Students stay and study under guidance. Access is restricted to enrolled learners.

display name: Sri Devi Vedavidhyalayam – Srividhya Sevasamithi – Srisailam
description_en: This institution provides education in Vedic and traditional studies. Teaching follows structured learning methods. The facility supports cultural education. Entry is limited to students and staff.

Sri Shankara Veda Smartha Patashala is a center for Vedic learning. It trains students in traditional scriptures. Classes are conducted regularly. The premises are used mainly for educational purposes.
The library provides reading and reference facilities. It contains books and study materials. Seating is available for quiet reading. Entry is subject to library rules.
This parking area is provided for visitor vehicles. It helps manage traffic near busy locations. Parking is allowed for limited durations.
This is an additional designated parking space. It supports overflow vehicle parking. Access may vary during peak times. Vehicles are parked at the owner’s risk.
Vehicle Parking is meant for two-wheelers and four-wheelers. It reduces congestion near public areas. Parking is usually time-bound. Security may be limited.
Car Parking in Srisailam is designated for private cars. It is located near major visitor areas. Parking slots are subject to availability. Charges may apply.
Ankalamma Parking provides vehicle parking near nearby facilities. It supports local and visitor traffic. Parking is available on a first-come basis. Follow local parking rules.
This car parking area serves visitors to Annapurna Satram. It allows easy access to nearby facilities. Parking is managed during peak hours. Vehicles should be parked properly.
Tourist Bus Parking is designated for buses and large vehicles. It helps manage group travel traffic. Entry is restricted to buses.
Ticket Counters are used for issuing entry or service tickets. They help manage visitor flow. Counters operate during fixed hours.
Prasadam Counters distribute temple prasadam to devotees. Service is managed by temple authorities. Timings are fixed daily.

display name: Saakshi Ganapathi Online Ticket Booking Counter
name_te: సాక్షి గణపతి ఆన్‌లైన్ టికెట్ బుకింగ్ కేంద్రం
name_hi: साक्षी गणपति ऑनलाइन टिकट बुकिंग केन्द्र
description_en: This counter assists visitors with online ticket bookings. It helps those unfamiliar with digital systems. Operates during set hours.
Kalyana Katta is a facility for hair tonsure rituals. It provides organized and hygienic services. Separate areas may be available. Timings are regulated.

display name: Srisailam Devasthanam Camera and Phone Keeping Room
name_te: శ్రీశైలం దేవస్థానం కెమెరా & ఫోన్ నిల్వ కేంద్రం
name_hi: श्रीशैलम देवस्थान कैमरा एवं फोन जमा कक्ष
description_en: This facility allows visitors to deposit cameras and mobile phones. It helps maintain temple security rules. Items are returned after exit. Lockers are issued with tokens.

display name: Srisailam Devasthanam Cloak Room Luggage Counter
name_te: శ్రీశైలం దేవస్థానం క్లోక్ రూమ్ సామాను కౌంటర్
name_hi: श्रीशैलम देवस्थान क्लोक रूम सामान काउंटर
description_en: The cloak room provides safe storage for luggage and belongings. It helps visitors move freely inside temple areas. Storage is temporary. Proper receipts are issued.
The Goshala houses and maintains cows under temple management. It supports animal care and protection. Visitors may view from designated areas. Access is controlled.
This facility focuses on cow protection and care. It is managed by the temple administration. Activities include feeding and medical care. Entry is limited.
Shikharam Car Parking is a designated parking facility near the Shikharam area of Srisailam.
Snana Ghattalu are designated bathing steps at Pathalaganga. They provide safe access to the river. Bathing is regulated during peak times. Visitors must follow safety instructions.
The Water Treatment Plant processes and supplies clean water to the town. It treats raw water to make it suitable for daily use. The facility operates continuously. Public access is restricted.
This electrical substation manages power distribution in the Srisailam area. It helps regulate voltage and supply stability. Operations run round the clock. Entry is restricted to authorized staff.
IndianOil fuel station provides petrol and diesel for vehicles. It supports local and tourist traffic. Fuel is dispensed during operating hours. Basic air and service facilities may be available.
This Bharat Petroleum fuel station supplies petrol and diesel. It serves private vehicles and buses. Located along a commonly used route. Operations follow standard fuel station timings.
HDFC Bank offers banking services such as deposits and withdrawals. It serves both residents and visitors. ATM access may be available.
Union Bank of India provides public banking services. It supports savings, withdrawals, and account services. The branch operates on regular banking days. ATM services may be attached.
This ATM provides cash withdrawal services. It is accessible to card holders at most hours. Useful for pilgrims and tourists.
The Andhra Bank ATM allows basic banking transactions. It supports cash withdrawals and balance checks. Located within the town area. Access is usually available round the clock.
This facility provides free drinking water to visitors. It helps pilgrims stay hydrated. Water availability may vary by time.
Public toilets and bathrooms are provided for visitor convenience. They are located near busy areas. Maintenance is done regularly.
This washroom facility is designated for women. It operates on a pay-and-use basis. Cleanliness is maintained regularly. Timings may vary.
Infinity Cool Drinks sells cold beverages and refreshments.Service is quick. Seating may be limited.

display name: 7 Hills Cool Drinks & General Stores (Srinivas Reddy Vundavelli)
description_en: This shop offers cool drinks and general daily-use items. It serves quick purchase needs.

display name: Kanaka Durga Digital Studio and Xerox
description_en: This center provides photo printing and xerox services. It also supports basic digital work.
Royal Xerox Center offers photocopy and print services.
Sneha Xerox Shop provides copying and document services
This shop handles tyre puncture repairs and new tyre sales. It supports two-wheelers and four-wheelers. Service is usually quick
This facility repairs punctured tyres. It offers basic tyre maintenance. Useful for emergency stops. Service time depends on workload.
SBMS Automobile Garage provides vehicle repair services. It handles basic mechanical work. Suitable for minor repairs.
This boutique offers designer clothing and tailoring services. It caters mainly to women’s wear. Products are displayed for selection.
This service provides professional makeup for events. Appointments may be required. Focus is on personal grooming services. Operates based on bookings.
The tattoo studio offers body art services. Designs are selected by customers. Hygiene standards are followed.
This store sells bangles and fashion accessories. It caters mainly to women shoppers.
Kangan Mahal offers bangles and ornament accessories. It is commonly visited by shoppers. Products are displayed for easy selection. Located in the shopping area.
This shop sells fabric and clothing materials. It serves tailoring and personal purchase needs. Various fabric types are available.
This is a commercial association or trading facility. It supports local business activities. Access is mainly for members and visitors.
This shopping complex houses multiple retail shops. It provides a single place for shopping needs. Visitors can access various services.
Sri Sri Tattva Store sells wellness and daily-use products. Items include health and lifestyle goods. Products are pre-packed.
This general store sells groceries and daily essentials. Items are available at standard prices.
BHUVANA Shop offers general merchandise and small goods. It supports everyday shopping needs.
Eshwara Traders supplies goods for local trade and retail. It supports business and household needs.
Ramsai Sweets & Bakery sells sweets and bakery items. Products are prepared fresh daily. It is popular for snacks and desserts.
